message: "Under the law, survivors must show they were trafficked, that they aren't being trafficked anymore and that the crime was connected to their trafficking. Also, the crime can't be considered violent under the law."

data.description: Inspired Innovation helps formerly incarcerated men and women steer through the overwhelming process of pursuing higher education, starting with their GEDs if necessary.
data.title: Trafficking survivor helps put formerly incarcerated on path to higher education
